mapper.select: SELECT A.memberid, A.password, A.grade, A.gubun, A.openflag, A.name, A.telephone, A.handphone, A.address, A.address_etc, A.introduce, A.latitude, A.longitude, A.deleteyn, A.lastconnecttime, DATE_FORMAT( A.usestartdate,'%Y.%m.%d') "usestartdate", DATE_FORMAT( A.useenddate,'%Y.%m.%d') "useenddate", DATE_FORMAT( A.regtime,'%Y.%m.%d') "regtime" FROM member A WHERE 1=1 AND A.memberid = #{memberid}
